text: Joyous occasion - A son has been born! New blood keeps the line strong, but may also give rise to jealousy if other siblings feel their own position is threatened.
Joyous occasion! A daughter has been born! New blood keeps the line strong, but may also give rise to jealousy if other siblings feel their own position is threatened.
A Precious Son is Born to Liu Bei
A Strong Daughter is Born to Guan Yu
A Strong Daughter is Born to Zhang Fei
A Strong Son is Born to Guan Yu
A Strong Son is Born to Zhang Fei
A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Liu Bei gives birth to a son. He has pure and mischievous eyes.
A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Guan Yu gives birth to a daughter. The child the spitting image of her father, She may become a heroine.
A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Guan Yu gives birth to a son. He will definitely be a great general!
A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Zhang Fei gives birth to a daughter. The child the spitting image of her father, She may become a heroine.
A most joyous occasion! The mistress of Zhang Fei gives birth to a son. He will definitely be a great general!
